city.name: Nieu-Bethesda
city.description: The Owl House: This eccentric museum, created by artist Helen Martins, is a must-see. Her whimsical sculptures and colorful creations using ostrich eggshells offer a unique glimpse into her artistic vision.  Karoo Landscape: The vast, semi-arid Karoo landscape surrounding Nieu-Bethesda is a photographer's paradise. Dramatic sunsets, starry night skies, and unique rock formations create a sense of tranquility and remoteness. Arts and Crafts Scene: Nieu-Bethesda fosters a vibrant arts and crafts scene. Explore local galleries and studios to discover one-of-a-kind pieces by talented artisans. Stargazing Paradise: With minimal light pollution, Nieu-Bethesda offers exceptional stargazing opportunities. Witness the Milky Way in all its glory and marvel at the constellations on a clear night.Relaxing Escape: Nieu-Bethesda provides a welcome escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Enjoy the slow pace, friendly locals, and peaceful atmosphere.

foreignLanguage.phrase: I have been intrigued by the Korean language ever since I first listened to Korean pop music.

favouriteSubjects.title: SUBJECTS
favouriteSubjects.phrase: Graduated with BCom in Information Systems at the University of Johannesburg
